space control: Red = a square black controls. Green = a square white controls. Yellow = a square contested by both players
legal moves: Click on a piece and a blue dot will appear on all the squares that piece can move to
piece flair: When you move a piece, all the pieces that come under attack as a direct result of the piece you moved will pulse white
forks: All the moves that would result in a simultaneous attack of two pieces are shown
pins: This feature is not yet implemented
history: Every move is recorded in this column using algebraic notation.
pgn: PGN is a plain-text file format to record chess games taht can be inputed into many computer programs
